name: @tabletop-playground/api
description: This is the API definition for [Tabletop Playground](https://tabletop-playground.com), the modern digital tabletop game for fans and creators! Play solo or with up to eight players online in a physically simulated 3D environment. Create your own games with the in-game editor, and enhance them using JavaScript.
author: Plasticity Studios <contact@tabletop-playground.com>
